name: Torque
description:
===ABOUT
Torque is a game of skill and reflex. Pilot two ships that spin and weave through an obstacle course in order to fire their weapon. With funky graphics and a catchy soundtrack Torque is sure to blow your mind! Both because it's so fun and because it's just incredibly hard.

===INSTRUCTIONS
Use the arrow keys to rotate your ships. Rotating will charge your weapon. Hold X to activate slowmotion. Your weapon will not charge during slowmotion. Once your weapon is sufficiently charged it will automatically unload onto the enemy.

===CREDITS
Programming & Design by Rob van Saaze
Music by Nik Sudan, Fantomenk & Bossfight
